name: Pet_Defence
description:
In the game, you will be given different types of pets with varying abilities to fight against the invading ghosts who sneak into the house during the night seeking to devour their human owner.

This is a prototype from game development course DATT4300, it is developed for 3 months.

Credits to

    Programmers:  Shiyi Du, Kristen Grinyer.

    Game Artists and Animators: Tran Pham, Dan Li, Anny Ky.

    (They have made some amazing arts and animations that are not in the game yet :( )

All the music used in game are paid and authorized,

The sound effects are found online for free.
